Cloudflare Named A 'Leader' in the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Edge Delivery Services 2024 Vendor Assessment

Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Edge Delivery Services 2024 Vendor Assessment (doc #US51812424, November 2024). The report noted, "Cloudflare is a highly competitive player with a clear drive for innovation. With a keen focus on the developer ecosystem and a strategy to invest in new technologies, it has managed to grow to its position in the enterprise." We believe this recognition represents a new chapter in the evolution of the application services and edge delivery market. We cite it as a testament to Cloudflare's connectivity cloud and its ability to consolidate more use cases onto our unified platform to simplify our customers' architectures across applications, network, and cybersecurity. Cloudflare modernizes and expands the edge delivery infrastructure to include security and customizable developer services, removes point solutions, and integrates IT domains onto a unified intelligent platform of programmable cloud-native services, all managed through a simplified interface without security or performance tradeoffs. ![IDC MarketScape:Worldwide Edge Delivery Services 2024](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/51wMDrTdO4l4n9hRzVLMfF/4c71732664ce91ac14d6bf58a5d835e4/image-2024-11-18-08-13-14-601.png) Register for the report excerpt here to get the IDC MarketScape's detailed perspective on Cloudflare and the edge delivery market.

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
IDC MarketScape vendor analysis model is designed to provide an overview of the competitive fitness of ICT suppliers in a given market. The research methodology utilizes a rigorous scoring methodology based on both qualitative and quantitative criteria that results in a single graphical illustration of each vendor's position within a given market. The Capabilities score measures vendor go-to-market and business execution in the short-term. The Strategy score measures alignment of vendor strategies with customer requirements in a 3–5-year timeframe. Vendor market share is represented by the size of the icons.
